caption.p: Fourier-transform infrared spectroscopy (FTIR) analysis for the essential oil combination of black pepper + eucalyptus (BE) at different temperatures (15, 25, and 35 °C) and different times of storage (1–3 months) (different colors refer to different temperature per subfigure). ( a) This figure refer to the effect of different temperature at 15, 25, and 35 °C on the combination of BE stored for one month; ( b) the second subfigure refer to different temperature at 15, 25, and 35 °C on the combination of BE stored for two months; ( c) the third subfigure refer to different temperature at 15, 25, and 35 °C on the combination of BE stored for three months.
